Durable: Minimum 8 when regaining HP

Soul Of Artifice: End 1 attunement when reduced to 0 HP to retain 1 HP
Steel Defender: Create mechanical companion (AC 17, HP 105 (Mending repairs 2d6 HP, self-repair 2d8+6 3/dy), Attack +8 inflicts 1d8+6, use Reaction for R5' Deflect Attack (inflicts Disadv on attack), MV 40', Dex Save +7, Con save +8, immune to poison and charmed, exhausted, poisoned, and surprised conditions)

Spells:
Acid Splash (A0 Conj): R60' Ranged touch inflicts 4d6 HP acid (Dex neg)
Alarm (A1 Abju): R30' Entry into 20' cu triggers audible or mental alarm for 8 hr
Animate Objects (A5 Tran): R120' 10 small, 5 medium, 2 large, or 1 huge objects obey R500' commands for conc or 1 min
Blight (A4 Necr): R30' target suffers 8d8 HP necrotic (Con half (plant Disadv, 64 HP on fail))
Dancing Lights (A0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights move 60' for conc or 1 min
Gaseous Form (A3 Tran): Touched creature becomes gaseous for conc or 1 hr
Glyph Of Warding (A3 Abju): 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder (Dex half) or spell up to level 3 when triggered
Grease (A1 Conj): R60' Creatures in 10' sq fall (Dex neg) for 1 min
Greater Restoration (A5 Abju): Touched becomes unexhausted, uncharmed, unpetrified, or uncursed or regains ability or HP
Jump (A1 Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Leomund's Secret Chest (A4 Conj): Touched chest moves to and from Ethereal Plane for 60+ days
Ray Of Frost (A0 Evoc): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP cold and -10' Speed for 1 rd
Revivify (A3 Necr): Restores touched 1-minute-old corpse to life w/1 HP
Scorching Ray (A2 Evoc): R120' 3 ranged attacks inflict 2d6 HP fire each
Shield (A1 Abju): Use Reaction to gain +5 AC and immunity to Magic Missile for 1 rd
Spare The Dying (A0 Necr): Touched creature becomes stable
Spider Climb (A2 Tran): Touched crawls on walls and ceilings for conc or 1 hr
Wall Of Fire (A4 Evoc): R120' 60'x20' wall inflicts 5d8 HP fire (Dex half) for conc or 1 min
Web (A2 Conj): R60' 20' cu restrains creatures (Dex neg, Str frees) for conc or 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Aberrant Dragonmark: Know S0 cantrip, casting chosen S1 spell 1/long rest gives self 1d temporary HP or inficts 1d HP force randomly w/in 30'
Alchemical Savant: +3 on spell healing and acid, fire, necrotic, or poison damage
Arcane Firearm: Spells cast through prepared wand, staff, or rod inflict +1d8 HP damage
Boots Of The Winding Path: Gives ability to teleport 15'
Chemical Mastery: Cast Greater Restoration and Heal 1/long rest
Elemental Adept (Lightning): Lightning spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Enhanced Arcane Focus: Rod, staff, or wand gives +2 spell attacks, ignores half cover
Enhanced Defense: Shield or armor gives +2 AC
Enhanced Weapon: Gives +2 attack and damage
Experimental Elixir: After a long rest, use alchemist's supplies to create 3 elixirs of healing, swiftness, resilience, boldness, flight, or transformation (spend spell slot for additional)
Homunculus Servant: Creates mechanical companion (AC 13, HP 24, Attack R30' +8 inflicts 1d4+6 HP force, Evasion, Channel Magic) that obeys self
Magical Tinkering: Imbue 3 objects with light, message, sound, odor, or picture
Radiant Weapon: Gives +1 attack and damage, 30' bright light, blinds successful attacker (DC 17 Con neg) for 1 rd; 4 charges regains 1d4/dy
Repeating Shot: Gives +1 attack and damage and unlimited ammunition
Replicate Magic Item: Allows replication of wondrous item
Repulsion Shield: Gives +1 AC, use Reaction to push successful attacker 15'; 4 charges regains 1d4/dy
Resistant Armor: Gives +1 AC and resistance to chosen damage type
Restorative Reagents: Cast Lesser Restoration 3/long rest, elixirs give 2d6+3 temporary HP
Returning Weapon: Gives +1 attack and damage, returns after ranged attack
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
